channel.title: [PI] Applydead error, please help me
channel.description:
Hello Rune-Server,
[code] [21-5-13 19:09]: java.lang.NullPointerException [21-5-13 19:09]: at server.model.players.PlayerAssistant.applyDead(PlayerAssistant.java:1520) [21-5-13 19:09]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:1493) [21-5-13 19:09]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:151) [21-5-13 19:09]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:186) [/code]
Thats my error, what seems to be the problem here?
My applydead method on pastebin: [url=http://pastebin.com/4P0KfpHw]http://pastebin.com/4P0KfpHw[/url]
Thanks to everyone that trys to help me, really appreciated.
Remco
